title: After a B.Tech in computer science, how can I join Google? - Quora

response.answer_text: Actually many college are invite Google company for the campus, but in a maximum cases i was see IIT college are invite Google company, so if want to join then you can seat in Campus Selection. An another chance you can apply directly for the in Google- you just search career in Google and then apply. if you really do job in a Google so first of all clear your all concept related from technology and you learn 2–3 language.Because in every second many peoples apply for the job in Google but Google selected a person who can do something different and something new.Anyways best of luck for your future.!!!

If you are from the IITs they come to campus so you should be able to get in via that route. Usually they’ll (as a matter of fact any good company) will need you to show exceptional talent and then they’ll hire you. Exceptional talent can mean top score in SPOJ, winning hackathons, popular open source contributor etc..
You should ask/search this question on Googl
